# Copilot Instructions for Danish Pension AI Platform

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview

This is a React + Vite + TypeScript web application for the Danish pension sector that provides AI agent solutions. The platform integrates with AWS Bedrock for AI capabilities.

## Key Technologies

- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- AWS Bedrock for AI services
- Modern CSS with responsive design
- Danish language support

## Code Style Guidelines

- Use TypeScript strictly with proper type definitions
- Follow React functional components with hooks
- Use modern ES6+ syntax
- Implement proper error handling for AWS Bedrock calls
- Use descriptive Danish/English variable names where appropriate
- Follow responsive design principles

## AWS Bedrock Integration

- Use AWS SDK v3 for Bedrock integration
- Implement proper error handling for API calls
- Use environment variables for AWS configuration
- Follow security best practices for API keys

## Danish Pension Domain

- Use appropriate pension terminology in Danish/English
- Implement user-friendly language for complex pension concepts
- Follow Danish design patterns and accessibility standards
